text: @realDonaldTrump @RoyCooperNC @DanForestNC Thrilled you will take your clown car convention elsewhere.  Hope covid19 finds you in FL. At least Gov Cooper cares for his state. You sir on other hand are responsible for 130k DEAD Americans.
